attributes.action: respond in a timely fashion to e-petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
how long must we wait for number 10 to respond as per their own stated terms.

Please join me in asking to have all epetitions with over 100 signatures respionded to - focussing on the highest level of signatures first and working back.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
